Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Molten Core^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
That did it, thanks!...hmm, that's odd. No signal from the ^green;lab on Delta Freya II^reset;. I wonder if my friend is okay?

Why am I up here? I'm trying to use this relay, but the damned thing is shorted out. I desperately need to reach a friend. Could you perhaps craft a ^orange;Molten Core^reset; in your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;? That should fix it right up.
